languages.text: {n}Когитатор выглядит погруженным в режим ожидания: экран и датчики едва заметно мерцают, не реагируя на ваше приближение.{/n}
{n}The cogitator appears to be in standby mode — the screen and sensors emit a dull glow, in no way reacting to your approach.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когитатор выглядит погруженным в режим ожидания: экран и датчики едва заметно мерцают, не реагируя на ваше приближение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cogitator appears to be in a standby mode: the screen and the gauges emit a dull shimmer, in no way reacting to your approach.{/n}
{n}The cogitator appears to be in a standby mode: the screen and the gauges emit a dull shimmer, in no way reacting to your approach.{/n}
{n}The cogitator appears to be in standby mode — the screen and sensors emit a dull glow, in no way reacting to your approach.{/n}
{n}The cogitator appears to be in standby mode — the screen and sensors emit a dull glow, in no way reacting to your approach.{/n}
{n}The cogitator appears to be in standby mode — the screen and sensors emit a dull glow, in no way reacting to your approach.{/n}

languages.text: {n}沉思者似乎处于待机模式，屏幕与传感器发出暗淡的光芒。当你接近时，它没有任何反应。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator appears to be in standby mode — the screen and sensors emit a dull glow, in no way reacting to your approach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}思考器似乎处于待机模式，屏幕与传感器发出暗淡的光芒。当你接近时，它没有任何反应。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El cogitador parece estar en modo de espera. La pantalla y los sensores emiten un brillo tenue y no reaccionan a tu presencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator appears to be in standby mode — the screen and sensors emit a dull glow, in no way reacting to your approach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El cogitador parece estar en modo de espera. La pantalla y los sensores emiten un brillo tenue y no reaccionan a tu presencia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}考算機はスリープモードになっているようだ。画面とセンサーは鈍い光を放っており、こちらが近づいてもまったく反応しない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator appears to be in standby mode — the screen and sensors emit a dull glow, in no way reacting to your approach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}考算機はスリープモードになっているようだ。画面とセンサーは鈍い光を放っており、こちらが近づいてもまったく反応しない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Cogitator befindet sich anscheinend im Standby-Modus – Bildschirm und Sensoren leuchten dumpf und reagieren in keiner Weise auf deine Annäherung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator appears to be in standby mode — the screen and sensors emit a dull glow, in no way reacting to your approach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Cogitator befindet sich anscheinend im Standby-Modus – Bildschirm und Sensoren leuchten dumpf und reagieren in keiner Weise auf deine Annäherung.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le cogitateur semble être en veille : l'écran et les capteurs n'émettent qu'une faible lumière, sans réagir à votre approche.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator appears to be in standby mode — the screen and sensors emit a dull glow, in no way reacting to your approach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le cogitateur semble être en veille : l'écran et les capteurs n'émettent qu'une faible lumière, sans réagir à votre approche.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kavramsayar, uyku modunda gibi görünüyor. Sönük bir parıltı saçan ekran ve sensörler, yaklaştığında tepki vermiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator appears to be in standby mode — the screen and sensors emit a dull glow, in no way reacting to your approach.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kavramsayar uyku modunda gibi görünüyor. Ekran ve sensörler, sönük biçimde parlıyor ve yaklaştığında tepki vermiyor.{/n}
